TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 顯示階層式集合，加上標籤的項目，皆由。

span.span: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合會保存所有物件指派給控制項。The collection holds all the objects that are assigned to the control. 此集合中的樹狀節點稱為根樹狀節點。The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes. 任何後續會新增至根樹狀節點的樹狀節點稱為子節點。Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node. 因為每個可以包含其他集合物件，您可能很難判斷您樹狀結構中的位置，當您逐一查看集合。Because each can contain a collection of other objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection. 您可以剖析使用的字串字串值，以判斷 where標籤開始和結束。You can parse the string by using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 您可以藉由指派中顯示的樹狀節點旁的映像要屬性和參考的索引值中指派它。You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an to the property and referencing the index value of an in the to assign that . 若要將指派映像使用下列屬性：Use the following properties to assign images: - 設定屬性的索引值您想要顯示未選取樹狀節點時。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is not selected. - 設定屬性的索引值您想要在選取的樹狀節點時顯示。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is selected. 所參考的映像並屬性值會指派給所有樹狀節點所顯示的預設映像集合。The images referenced by the and property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the collection. 個別的樹狀節點可以設定覆寫預設映像和屬性。Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the and properties. 中所顯示之狀態影像是預設的 16 x 16 像素。The state images displayed in the are 16 x 16 pixels by default. 設定屬性不會影響在映像的顯示方式。Setting the property of the will have no effect on how the images are displayed. 不過，狀態影像會調整大小，根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 可以展開樹狀節點，以顯示子樹狀節點的下一個層級。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 使用者可以展開依序按一下加號 （+） 按鈕，如果旁邊顯示，或您可以展開藉由呼叫方法。The user can expand the by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the , or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展開所有子樹狀結構節點中的層級集合中，呼叫方法。To expand all the child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以摺疊子系藉由呼叫層級方法或使用者可以按下減號 （-） 按鈕，如果旁顯示。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the . 您也可以呼叫展開和摺疊狀態之間進行切換的方法。You can also call the method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states. 樹狀節點，可以選擇顯示核取方塊。Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes. 若要顯示核取方塊，將的屬性至`true`。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 屬性設定為`true`為樹狀節點處於選取狀態。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性從或事件會導致事件引發很多次，並可能會導致非預期的行為。Setting the property from within the or event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior. 例如，您可能會設定事件處理常式，當您以遞迴方式更新，讓使用者沒有展開，並檢查每一個個別的子節點的屬性。For example, you might set the property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually. 若要避免事件引發很多次，請將邏輯加入至您只有才會執行您的遞迴程式碼的事件處理常式的屬性未設定為。To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the property of the is not set to . 如需如何執行這項操作的範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中的或事件。For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the or events. 您可以變更外觀藉由設定的某些顯示和樣式屬性的控制項。You can change the appearance of the control by setting some of its display and style properties. 設定要`true`會顯示每個旁邊的加號或減號按鈕，可以展開或摺疊，分別。Setting to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively. 設定屬性，以`true`導致以顯示所有根樹狀節點將都聯結在一起的線條。Setting the property to `true` causes the to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together. 您可以顯示連接至其根節點的子樹狀節點，藉由設定線條屬性設`true`。You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the property to `true`. 設定屬性設`true`樹狀節點標籤的外觀，當滑鼠指標至其上的變更。Setting the property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them. 熱追蹤，當樹狀節點標籤採用超連結外觀。When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink. 您可以完全自訂的外觀控制項。You can also completely customize the appearance of the control. 若要這樣做，請設定以外的值的屬性，並處理事件。To do this, set the property to a value other than and handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 設定時， ， ，和在執行階段，屬性控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱) 來更新控制項的外觀。When setting the , , , and properties at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 這會導致所有摺疊，除了所選取的樹狀節點。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. [!code-csharp[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/vb/form1.vb#10)] 在下列且更複雜的程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following, more complex code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要有資料指標檔案，稱為`MyWait.cur`應用程式目錄中，您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會展開所有節點，並且已新增處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有摺疊的節點。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件處理常式可讓您判斷指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點已檢查子系，摺疊會取消該節點。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 若要允許標準節點摺疊，按一下節點旁邊的減號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 這項行為也可以實作處理事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes2/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AfterLabelEdit As NodeLabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於編輯樹狀節點標籤文字之後。

span.span: Occurs after the tree node label text is edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，則會將它放入可編輯的狀態，可讓使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未選取節點時，就不會發生此事件。This event does not occur when the node is unselected. 若要偵測是否已清除選取項目，您可以測試屬性。To detect whether the selection was cleared, you can test the property. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼中包含表單的表單控制項，名為`TreeView1`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a control named `TreeView1`. 這個範例需要`TreeView1`會填入項目和事件所連接的範例中定義的事件處理常式。This example requires that `TreeView1` is populated with items and the event is connected to the event handler defined in the sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會展開所有節點，並且已新增處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有摺疊的節點。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件處理常式可讓您判斷指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點已檢查子系，摺疊會取消該節點。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 若要允許標準節點摺疊，按一下節點旁邊的減號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 這項行為也可以實作處理事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 完整的範例，請參閱建構函式的參考主題。For the complete example, see the constructor reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 為維護效能，而項目會加入一個一次，呼叫方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法，防止控制項被繪製直到呼叫方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要將項目新增至樹狀檢視控制項的慣用的方法是使用方法，將樹狀結構節點項目的陣列加入至樹狀結構檢視。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 不過，如果您想要一次新增一個項目，使用方法，即可避免控制項從 新增作業期間的繪製。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允許繼續繪製控制項，呼叫時所有樹狀節點已都加入至樹狀檢視的方法。To allow the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要有資料指標檔案，稱為`MyWait.cur`應用程式目錄中，您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取方塊會顯示左邊的樹狀節點標籤和 樹狀節點，若有的話。A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node , if any. 核取方塊可讓使用者一次選取多個樹狀節點。Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time. 時屬性設為`true`，和屬性設定，每個中所含顯示的第一個和第二個映像從表示取消核取或分別檢查狀態。When the property of a is set to `true`, and the property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. 不過，顯示的映像可能不同，如果發生下列情況：如果節點的設定值非 0 即 1，而屬性之父代設為`false`，則將不會自動重設為-1，表示未設定。However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the property of the parent is set to `false`, the will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set. 在此情況下，會顯示狀態影像的指定的索引位置。In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown. 如果設定為`true`同樣地，第一個和第二個映像的來分別表示已核取或取消核取狀態，會顯示。If is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 設定時在執行階段，屬性控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱) 來更新控制項的外觀。When setting the property at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 這會導致所有摺疊，除了所選取的樹狀節點。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會摺疊所有節點，並且已新增處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有節點會展開。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件處理常式可讓您判斷指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點沒有已檢查的子系，該節點的擴充而遭到取消。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要允許標準的節點展開，按一下節點旁邊的加號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 這項行為也可以實作處理事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會摺疊所有物件，其中包含所有子樹狀節點處於控制項。The method collapses all the objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the control. > [!NOTE] > 狀態仍然存在。The state of a persists. 例如，假設您呼叫根樹狀節點的方法。For example, suppose that you call the method for a root tree node. 如果子樹狀節點不先前摺疊，它們會出現在其先前的展開狀態。If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state. 呼叫方法可確保所有樹狀節點，會都出現在摺疊的狀態。Calling the method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會摺疊所有節點，並且已新增處理常式事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接著，所有節點會展開。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件處理常式可讓您判斷指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點沒有已檢查的子系，該節點的擴充而遭到取消。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要允許標準的節點展開，按一下節點旁邊的加號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 這項行為也可以實作處理事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點通常會由作業系統繪製。The nodes of a are typically drawn by the operating system. 屬性可讓您自訂節點的外觀。The property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes. 若要這樣做，請設定來或是，並提供的處理常式事件。To do this, set to or and provide a handler for the event. 這稱為主控描繪。This is called owner drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用所指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括將自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂大部分的設定色彩的色彩屬性，但選項醒目提示色彩不是做為屬性使用。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必須使用主控描繪，繪製節點標記，以及繪製夠大，無法包含節點標籤的自訂反白顯示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件可自訂中的節點外觀使用主控描繪的控制項。Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 會引發這個事件時，才屬性設定為的值或。This event is raised only when the property is set to values of or . 下表指出如何您可以自訂當屬性設為這些值。The following table indicates how the can be customized when the property is set to these values. |DrawMode 屬性值DrawMode property value|TreeNode 自訂TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| ||可以自訂標籤 區域。The label area can be customized. 所有其他自動繪製項目。All other elements are drawn automatically.| ||整個外觀可以自訂。The appearance of the entire can be customized. 圖示、 核取方塊、 加號和減號，以及如果他們想要連接節點的線條也必須以手動方式繪製。Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| 區域可值會佔用它所使用所指定的字型來繪製控制項的屬性是在其中一個節點可以按一下來選取它的區域。The region that the value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the control's property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 這會呼叫點擊的測試區域。This is called the hit test region. 如果您繪製此區域以外，您應該提供您自己選取節點，按一下其可見的區域時的程式碼。If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked. 點擊的測試區域對應到屬性使用時。The hit test region corresponds to the property when using . 使用時，不過屬性包含的整個寬度。When using , however, the property encompasses the entire width of the . 在此情況下，您可以存取的點擊的測試區域取得值，並存取其屬性。In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the value and accessing its property. 然後，您可以繪製點擊的測試區域內這些範圍中，節點，或您可以提供自己的點擊的測試程式碼。You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code. 請注意，設定屬性不會變更大小的點擊的測試區域，而會使用指定的字型，整個計算。Note that setting the property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire . 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用所指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括將自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂大部分的設定色彩的色彩屬性，但選項醒目提示色彩不是做為屬性使用。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必須使用主控描繪，繪製節點標記，以及繪製夠大，無法包含節點標籤的自訂反白顯示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製節點標籤和自訂所選取的項目醒目提示以手動方式。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`以便由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，處理常式事件提供點擊測試。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 根據預設，您可以選取節點，只能透過按一下其標籤周圍的區域。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件處理常式如果有的話，請選取節點，此區域內或節點標記，周圍區域內任何位置按一下。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 為維護效能，而項目會加入一個一次，呼叫方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法，防止控制項被繪製直到呼叫方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 若要將項目新增至樹狀檢視控制項的慣用的方法是使用方法，將樹狀結構節點項目的陣列加入至樹狀結構檢視。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 不過，如果您想要一次新增一個項目，使用方法，即可避免控制項從 新增作業期間的繪製。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允許控制項繼續繪製控制項，呼叫時所有樹狀節點已都加入至樹狀檢視的方法。To allow control the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要有資料指標檔案，稱為`MyWait.cur`應用程式目錄中，您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會展開所有物件，其中包含所有子樹狀節點處於控制項。The method expands all the objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the control. > [!NOTE] > 狀態仍然存在。The state of a persists. 例如，假設您呼叫方法，然後按一下 個別的根樹狀節點處於摺疊狀態。For example, suppose that you call the method, and then the individual root tree nodes are collapsed. 子樹狀節點不已摺疊，並再次展開根樹狀節點時，會出現在其先前的展開狀態。The child tree nodes have not been collapsed, and will appear in their previously-expanded state when the root tree nodes are expanded again. 呼叫方法可確保所有樹狀節點，會都出現在摺疊的狀態。Calling the method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會展開所有樹狀節點控制何時勾選，並摺疊當已清除。The following code example expands all the tree nodes in a control when a is checked, and collapses the when the is cleared. 此範例中，您需要具有，，用來控制，有數個（最好是具有三個或多個層級） 的物件。This example requires that you have a with a , and a control with a that has several objects (preferably with three or more levels). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`選取項目反白顯示跨過樹狀檢視中的整個寬度，而不是只樹狀節點標籤的寬度顯示。When is `true`, a selection highlight spans the entire width of the tree view, display instead of the width of just the tree node label. 屬性會被忽略，如果設定為`true`。The property is ignored if is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何自訂。The following code example illustrates a customized . 藉由繼承類別，這個自訂的版本具有的典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 變更建構函式中的各種屬性值提供獨特的外觀。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因為屬性設定為`false`，自訂的控制項也會覆寫方法，使節點可以展開和摺疊在按一下時。Because the property is set to `false`, the customized control also overrides the method so nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以這種方式自訂的控制項可以用於整個組織中，輕鬆地提供一致的介面，而不需要在每個個別的專案中指定的控制項屬性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以傳遞並座標做為事件`x`和`y`參數。You can pass the and coordinates of the event as the `x` and `y` parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，則會將它放入可編輯的狀態，可讓使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，則屬性沒有任何作用。If the property is set to `true`, the property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為`true`，每個樹狀節點標籤採用超連結外觀，滑鼠指標通過上方。When the property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it. 字型樣式套用至而設為藍色，讓標籤會顯示為連結。The font style is applied to the and the is set to blue to make the label appear as a link. 網際網路使用者的作業系統設定不受控制的外觀。The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何自訂。The following code example illustrates a customized . 藉由繼承類別，這個自訂的版本具有的典型的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 變更建構函式中的各種屬性值提供獨特的外觀。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因為屬性設定為`false`，自訂的控制項也會覆寫方法以便可以展開及摺疊時在按一下節點。Because the property is set to `false`, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以這種方式自訂的控制項可以用於整個組織中，輕鬆地提供一致的介面，而不需要在每個個別的專案中指定的控制項屬性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在此範例中，可以將任何節點拖曳至另一個節點不被拖曳節點的子系。In this example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 拖曳的節點，其中包含所有子系的節點，會變成目的地節點的子系。The dragged node, which includes all its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 使用滑鼠左鍵時，會將拖曳的節點移動到目的地節點。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 使用滑鼠右鍵時，會將拖曳的節點複製到目的地節點。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否可編輯樹狀節點的標籤文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label text of the tree nodes can be edited.

value.span: 如果可以編輯樹狀節點標籤文字;否則， 。

span.span: if the label text of the tree nodes can be edited; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法適用於只有當屬性是`true`。The method works only if the property is `true`. 如果是`false`當您嘗試編輯的標籤，將會擲回例外狀況和樹狀節點將不處於可編輯的狀態。If is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，則會將它放入可編輯的狀態，可讓使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下滑鼠，包括加號的樹狀結構節點的任何部分，就會發生此事件 (**+**) 或減號 (**-**)，指出是否要摺疊的節點或展開。This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. summary.span: 發生於使用者按兩下滑鼠。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按兩下滑鼠，包括加號 （+） 或減號 （-），指出是否摺疊或展開節點樹狀結構任何的節點部分，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件，以及如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`treeView1`。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 填入`treeView1`位於檔案的名稱`c:\`系統，執行此範例的目錄，並關聯事件`treeView1`使用`treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick`在此範例中的方法。Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example. 這個範例會要求使用者執行此範例的電腦上具有系統管理員權限。This example requires that the user has administrator privileges on the machine running the example. summary.span: 取得指派給樹狀檢視控制項的樹狀節點集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.

value.span: A表示指派給樹狀檢閱控制項的樹狀節點。

span.span: A that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會保留的集合物件，每個都有屬性，可以包含它自己。The property holds a collection of objects, each of which has a property that can contain its own . 這個巢狀結構的樹狀節點難以瀏覽樹狀結構中，但屬性可讓您更輕鬆地判斷您的樹狀結構內的位置。This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 一開始，會傳回第一個的根樹狀節點，位於頂端。Initially, the returns the first root tree node, which is located at the top of the . 不過，如果使用者已捲動內容，另一個樹狀結構節點可能位於頂端。However, if the user has scrolled the contents, another tree node might be at the top. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性沒有作用時屬性值是`false`。Setting this property has no effect when the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和成員。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and members. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼中包含表單的表單`TreeView`控制項，名為`TreeView1`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a `TreeView` control that is named `TreeView1`. 呼叫`InitializeTreeView`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeTreeView` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. summary.span: 取得或設定實作來執行自訂排序節點。

span.span: Gets or sets the implementation of to perform a custom sort of the nodes.

value.span: 來執行自訂排序。

span.span: The to perform the custom sort.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用自訂排序時設定。The custom sort is applied when the is set. 如果變更標籤時，您可以呼叫方法來重新排序項目，與所指定的自訂瀏覽屬性。If a label is changed, you can call the method to sort the items again with the custom sorter specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 使用的預設瀏覽方法，根據應用程式所指定。The default sorter uses the method based on the specified by the application. 這表示具有相等值的物件會保留在已加入至訂單控制項。This means that objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the control. 此行為可能不同，如果套用自訂排序。This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用來排序從最小到最大的節點屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to sort nodes from smallest to largest. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeTreeView1`從表單的建構函式或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeTreeView1` from the form's constructor or event handler. summary.span: 取得樹狀檢閱控制項中完整可見的樹狀節點數。

span.span: Gets the number of tree nodes that can be fully visible in the tree view control.

value.span: 數目中完整可見的項目控制項。

span.span: The number of items that can be fully visible in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可能會大於在樹狀檢視中的樹狀節點數。The value can be greater than the number of tree nodes in the tree view. 將用戶端視窗的高度，樹狀節點項目的高度來計算值。The value is calculated by dividing the height of the client window by the height of a tree node item. 結果是總數物件的可以顯示在其目前的大小。The result is the total number of objects that the can display within its current dimensions.
